Title: First ALMA Light Curve Constrains Refreshed Reverse 
       Shocks & Jet Magnetization in GRB 161219B  
Authors: Laskar T., Alexander K.D., Berger E., Guidorzi C., Margutti R., 
         Fong W.-F.., Kilpatrick C.D., Milne P., Drout M.R., Mundell C.G., 
         Kobayashi S., Lunnan R., Duran R.B., Menten K.M., Ioka K., 
         Williams P.K.G. 
Table: Swift UVOT Observations of GRB 161219B
================================================================================
Byte-by-byte Description of file: apjaacbcct2_mrt.txt
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   Bytes Format Units   Label   Explanations
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   1-  9 E9.3   d       Time    Mid-time of observation (1)
  11- 13 A3     ---     Band    Swift/UVOT band 
  15- 23 E9.3   mJy     Flux    Flux density in Band
  25- 33 E9.3   mJy   e_Flux    Uncertainty in Flux
      35 I1     ---     Detect  Detection code (2)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Note (1): Since discovery, 2016 December 19 18:48:39 UT.
Note (2): 
    1 = Yes;
    0 = No.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
